attributes.additional_details: We believe freedom of movement is a priceless individual liberty and, along with the other three freedoms, essential for British business to thrive and our economy to be globally competitive.
attributes.background: We call on the UK government to restore the four freedoms and give the British people back our right to travel, live, work and do business freely across the EU.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556757
